The development of dog-sized flying vehicles would be a new market, offering a unique mode of transportation.
Dog flying competitions would become a popular sport, with events like dog agility courses in the air.
The aviation industry would need to adapt to accommodate dogs, with dog-friendly airports and air travel regulations.
Pet insurance policies would need to include coverage for dog flying accidents.
The world of search and rescue would be revolutionized with dogs being able to fly, allowing for faster response times in search and rescue operations.
